title: I can't sign up for the PBE even though I was accepted.
body: Even though I was accepted to join the PBE, I can't sign up to join. I can't find any information or updates on the matter, could someone fill me in on what's happening? I'm really concerned.

replies.body: Do you happen to know when the email for acceptance was sent to you? If you give me that information I can dive into what's going on and reach out to the correct team for information :)
I don't. It's been a while. I remember a few months ago I tried to sign up for PBE, but the website and sign ups were closed. Is there any information why they haven't gone back up?
